alert.note: Alert for St. Charles; Upper Jefferson; Upper Lafourche (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 11:27AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of St. John The Baptist, southeastern St. James, St. Charles, north central Lafourche and northwestern Jefferson Parishes through 1230 PM CDT... At 1127 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from River Ridge to near Mathews. Movement was north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Reserve, Metairie, Hahnville, Laplace, Avondale, Jefferson, Harahan, Gramercy, Lutcher, Montz, Luling, Garyville, River Ridge, Boutte, Ama, Destrehan, St. Rose, Killona, Norco and Paradis. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 201 and 229. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 8. Interstate 310 between mile markers 1 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: St. Charles; Upper Jefferson; Upper Lafourche
